com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

Interface TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotatedCorpusReader, SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ParserAnnotatedCorpusReader, PosTagAnnotatedCorpusReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParserRegexBasedCorpusReader, PosTagRegexBasedCorpusReader, StandoffReader, TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader

    public interface TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader
extends SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized sentences from a corpus.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

      static TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader getCorpusReader(java.io.Reader reader, Config config, TalismaneSession session)
      Builds an annotated corpus reader for a particular Reader and Config, where the config is the local namespace.

      Reads the next token sequence from the corpus.

      • nextTokenSequence

        TokenSequence nextTokenSequence()
                         throws TalismaneException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Reads the next token sequence from the corpus.
        Throws:
        TalismaneException - if impossible to read next sequence for logical reasons

      • getCorpusReader

        static TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader getCorpusReader(java.io.Reader reader,
                                                      Config config,
                                                      TalismaneSession session)
                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                      java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Builds an annotated corpus reader for a particular Reader and Config, where the config is the local namespace. For configuration example, see talismane.core.generic.tokeniser.input in reference.conf.
        Specified by:
        getCorpusReader in interface SentenceDetectorAnnotatedCorpusReader
        Parameters:
        config - the local configuration section from which we're building a reader
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - problem reading the files referred in the configuration
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the corpus-reader class could not be instantiated
